title: [Self-directed] Tool Utilization Strategies in Computer-Based Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and experience with digital device usage
context.additional_context: Experimental Design Using VR Simulation Tools in Smartphone-Centric Restricted Technology Environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain functional utilization strategies of science simulation tools with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners can reduce problem-solving time by 20% by applying systematic advice provided when using tools.
Learners can evaluate the appropriateness of tool usage through a 3-level assessment rubric utilizing metacognitive strategies
Learners can establish and implement tool utilization plans based on a goal-oriented learning attitude

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
